@dev Get the max value to be used with the marketplace.

calculateMarketplaceFee(uint256).details: Utility function for calculating the marketplace fee for given amount of wei.

calculatePrimarySaleFee(address,uint256).details: Utility function for calculating the primary sale fee for given amount of wei

getERC721ContractPrimarySaleFeePercentag.details: Get the primary sale fee percentage for a specific ERC721 contract.

getMarketplaceMaxValue().details: Get the max value to be used with the marketplace.

getMarketplaceMinValue().details: Get the max value to be used with the marketplace.

hasERC721TokenSold(address,uint256).details: Check whether the ERC721 token has sold at least once.

returns._0: bool of whether the token has sold.

markERC721Token(address,uint256,bool).details: Mark a token as sold. Requirements: - `_contractAddress` cannot be the zero address.

params._hasSold: bool of whether the token should be marked sold or not.
